verses.verse: If there is a controversy<WH7379> between men,<WH582> and they come<WH5066> to judgment,<WH4941> and the judges judge<WH8199> them;<WH6663> then they shall justify the righteous,<WH6662> and condemn<WH7561> the wicked;<WH7563>

and it shall be,<WH7563> if the wicked man be worthy<WH1121> to be beaten,<WH5221> that the judge<WH8199> shall cause him to lie down,<WH5307> and to be beaten<WH5221> before his face,<WH6440> according<WH1767> to his wickedness,<WH7564> by number.<WH4557>

Forty<WH705> stripes<WH5221> he may give him,<WH3254> he shall not exceed; lest,<WH3254> if he should exceed, and beat<WH5221> him above these with many<WH7227> stripes,<WH4347> then your brother<WH251> should seem vile to you.<WH7034>
You shall not muzzle<WH2629> the ox<WH7794> when he treads out the grain.<WH1778>

If brothers<WH251> dwell<WH3427> together,<WH3162> and one<WH259> of them die,<WH4191> and have no son,<WH1121> the wife<WH802> of the dead<WH4191> shall not be married outside<WH2351> to a stranger:<WH376> her husband<WH2993>'s brother shall go in<WH935> to her,<WH3947> and take her to him as wife,<WH802> and perform the duty of a husband<WH2992>'s brother to her.

It shall be,<WH1060> that the firstborn whom she bears shall succeed<WH6965> in the name<WH8034> of his brother<WH251> who is dead,<WH4191> that his name<WH8034> not be blotted out<WH4229> of Israel.<WH3478>

If the man<WH376> doesn't<WH2654> want to take<WH3947> his brother<WH2994>'s wife, then his brother<WH2994>'s wife shall go up<WH5927> to the gate<WH8179> to the elders,<WH2205> and say,<WH559> "My husband<WH2993>'s brother refuses<WH3985> to raise up<WH6965> to his brother<WH2993> a name<WH8034> in Israel;<WH3478> he will<WH14> not perform the duty of a husband<WH2992>'s brother to me."
Then the elders<WH2205> of his city<WH5892> shall call<WH7121> him,<WH1696> and speak to him:<WH5975> and if he stand, and say,<WH559> "I don't<WH2654> want to take her;<WH3947>"

then his brother<WH2994>'s wife shall come<WH5066> to him in the presence<WH5869> of the elders,<WH2205> and loose<WH2502> his shoe<WH5275> from off his foot,<WH7272> and spit<WH3417> in his face;<WH6440> and she shall answer<WH6030> and say,<WH559> "So shall it be done<WH6213> to the man<WH376> who does not build up<WH1129> his brother<WH251>'s house.<WH1004>"
His name<WH8034> shall be called<WH7121> in Israel,<WH3478> The house<WH1004> of him who has his shoe<WH5275> untied.<WH2502>

When men<WH582> strive<WH5327> together<WH3162> one with another,<WH251> and the wife<WH802> of the one<WH259> draws near<WH7126> to deliver<WH5337> her husband<WH376> out of the hand<WH3027> of him who strikes<WH5221> him,<WH7971> and puts forth her hand,<WH3027> and takes<WH2388> him by the secrets;<WH4016>
then you shall cut off<WH7112> her hand,<WH3709> your eye<WH5869> shall have no pity.<WH2347>
You shall not have in your bag<WH3599> diverse weights,<WH68> a great<WH1419> and a small.<WH6996>
You shall not have in your house<WH1004> diverse measures,<WH374> a great<WH1419> and a small.<WH6996>

You shall have a perfect<WH8003> and just<WH6664> weight.<WH68> You shall have a perfect<WH8003> and just<WH6664> measure,<WH374> that your days<WH3117> may be long<WH748> in the land<WH127> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you.<WH5414>
For all who do<WH6213> such things,<WH428> all who do<WH6213> unrighteously,<WH5766> are an abomination<WH8441> to Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
Remember<WH2142> what Amalek<WH6002> did<WH6213> to you by the way<WH1870> as you came forth<WH3318> out of Egypt;<WH4714>

how he met<WH7136> you by the way,<WH1870> and struck the hindmost<WH2179> of you,<WH2826> all who were feeble behind<WH310> you,<WH5889> when you were faint and weary;<WH3023> and he didn't<WH3373> fear God.<WH430>

Therefore it shall be,<WH3068> when Yahweh your God<WH430> has given you rest<WH5117> from all your enemies<WH341> all around,<WH5439> in the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you for an inheritance<WH5159> to possess<WH3423> it,<WH4229> that you shall blot out the memory<WH2143> of Amalek<WH6002> from under the sky;<WH8064> you shall not forget.<WH7911>
